description:
The government, along with Onimaru Developments, headed by Shizuka`s father, wants to build a stadium in Niigata, but the locals aren`t happy with the proposal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce micro n`est pas là pour faire joli
Kazari ja Nai no yo Mike wa
My Microphone Isn`t Just for Show
飾りじゃないのよマイクは
